title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Through Production System Simulation and Problem-Solving-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model and simulate the sequence of operations in a production system.
Learners enhance data analysis skills by solving real-world production problems using Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Learners can mathematically derive optimal production plans based on simulation results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
